INFLIGHT_ACC_CAL.desc: GUESS: Allows calibration of the accelerometer using stick commands while armed and flying.

MOTOR_STOP.desc: Stop motors from spinning when armed. You must disable Airmode, etc. as well to completely stop them!
MOTOR_STOP.aka: Don't spin the motors when armed

SERVO_TILT.desc: This feature enables CAMSTAB mode, which can be used to hold up to two axis steady using the accelerometer.

SOFTSERIAL.desc: Software Serial. Allows to configure emulated serial ports (UART) through pin remapping.

DISPLAY.desc: TODO: If this feature is enabled, and no display device is connected (or the display device is not powered up), there will be a delay of approx. 10 seconds on every reboot of the flight controller.

OSD.desc: Enables On Screen Display, used for overlaying the video feed with various information. It can be configured in the OSD tab of BF Configurator.

CHANNEL_FORWARDING.aka: Forward aux channels to servo outputs

TRANSPONDER.desc: TODO: Configure via the Race Transponder tab after enabling.

ESC_SENSOR.aka: Use KISS/BLHeli_32 ESC telemetry over a separate wire

ANTI_GRAVITY.aka: Temporary boost I-Term on high throttle changes
